data.text: @nxtbesthing What store location do you shop at? We’ll be happy to forward your request to the Merchandise Team. Thanks.
@AskTarget also need it for men also lol

@nxtbesthing Thank you for reaching out to us. We’ve forwarded your request to our buyers. Please let us know where your favorite location is so that we can share this with our merchandisers as well. Thanks again and we look forward to your reply. https://t.co/bEVlRVM6db
